featured_posts.title: Anthropic's Model Context Protocol: A New Standard for AI Integration
featured_posts.excerpt: In a significant move for the AI industry, Anthropic has introduced the Model Context Protocol (MCP), an open standard designed to revolutionize how AI systems interact with data sources and external tools.
